name: Healing Potion
description: A small vial containing a magic red liquid that heals 1d4+1 hit points when imbibed. The liquid fizzes and gives off a fruity aroma.

name: Dagger
description: A basic steel dagger with a bone handle, about 9 inches long. Drab but trustworthy.

name: Studded Leather armour
description: Well worn studded leather armour that has seen better days but still offers protection.

name: Identify Potion
description: A potion that enables the drinker to determine properties and attributes of magic items.

name: Candle of Divine Light
description: A blessed candle that sheds bright light in a 15 foot radius and will not burn down.
stats: Provides bright light in 15 foot radius for 24 hours

description: Well worn studded leather armour that has seen better days but still offers protection.

stats: Provides bright light in 15 foot radius for 24 hours

name: Javelin
stats: Can be thrown up to 120 feet as an ranged attack with a +3 bonus
description: A bronze javelin topped with leather fletching. Made by the local craftsmen, this simple spear can be a powerful tool in the right hands.

name: Dagger
description: A simple but trusty steel dagger with copper accents, use it to defend thyself!

name: Backpack
description: A simple canvas backpack to help carry your treasure and gear on your adventures.

name: Healer's Kit
description: A leather pouch containing bandages, salves, and herbs to treat common wounds and ailments.

name: Crowbar
description: A sturdy iron crowbar that could open locks or bust skulls in a pinch.

name: Shortsword
description: A well balanced short blade good for hacking and slashing against multiple opponents. Shortswords are light and nimble weapons favoured by rogues and fighters just starting their adventuring careers.

name: Club
description: A simple wooden stick that makes a loud noise and delivers painful blunt force when swung with force. Clubs are inexpensive but highly effective weapons in the hands of skilled warriors.

name: Leather armour
description: Simple leather armour made of hardened leather.

name: Traveller's Clothes
description: Simple outfit of a shirt, breeches and cloak for staying warm and reasonably protected on the road.

name: Healer's Kit
description: Contains bandages, salves and herbs to treat wounds.

name: Holy Symbol
description: A symbol of your deity to focus your prayers and gain divine inspiration.
